definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
over one billion/more than a billion
Yang Yi (974-1020), Northern Song dynasty writer and poet

sentences.english: After her acting career, Chen became a billionaire in the advertising business.
sentences.chinese: 结束演艺生涯后，陈晓旭从事广告业，身价过亿。

sentences.english: I have arrived at seven billion myself, theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 在理论上，我自己得出的数字为七十亿。

sentences.english: Morgan:No wonder the department stores earn billions in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 难怪百货公司可以在一天就赚进上亿的钞票。

sentences.english: Economists at Goldman Sachs reckon it should be closer to $500 billion.
sentences.chinese: 高盛投资公司评估说应该接近五千亿。

sentences.english: The previous year's deficit was $459 billion.
The water bridge with a value of 500 million euros could be used by freighters to transport.
sentences.chinese: 这座价值5亿欧元的水桥可以通行货船。

sentences.english: Apex ? 1 reappears to Deltan graviton telemetry 0.6 billion km from Delta.
sentences.chinese: 尖端1号，重新出现在距德尔塔6亿公里的地方。

sentences.english: That compares with 4.6 billion euros in revenue, and 570 stores, in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，这两个数字分别是，570和46亿欧元。

sentences.english: Nestlé sales for 2010 were almost CHF 110 bn.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢2010年销售总额将近110亿瑞士法郎。

sentences.english: According to statistics, the population of China's post-80s generation is over 200 million.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，中国80后一代人口数量已超过2亿。

sentences.english: A light-year is about 6 trillion miles, the distance light travels in a year.
sentences.chinese: 一光年大约6百亿亿英里，即光行走一年的距离。

sentences.english: We're all early birds in my family because we live on a farm.
sentences.chinese: 由亿我们生活在农场，所以全家人都起得很早。
年营业收入下降17%跌至5亿7千零6十万美元。

sentences.english: Among those new loans, 590.9 billion yuan was held by rural households, according to the regulator.
sentences.chinese: 在这些新贷款中，有5909亿支付给了农村拆迁户。

sentences.english: China a spared more than two billion yuan for the fight against SARA.
sentences.chinese: 为抗非典，中国拨出了二十多亿人民币。

definition: over one billion/more than a billion
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
